original_title: 「THE LAST PARTY～S. Fitzgerald’s last day～」 フィッツジェラルド最後の一日
overview: A musical about the life of F. Scott Fitzgerald. We begin on Dec. 21st, 1940, just moments before Scott dies. The main actor speaks to the audience, asking them what they think he was thinking of, what he was planning. Then he takes us back, for one last party before the end.
title: The Last Party ~S. Fitzgerald's Last Day~
